description: In this talk we will look at some broader characteristics such as: Distribution of datasizes, what extensions get used, frequent problems users encounter, anecdotal data around most desired upcoming features/developments. This talk will be heavily data driven and reveal some actual numbers and distributions on usage.
short_description: In this talk we will look at some broader characteristics such as: Distribution of datasizes, what extensions get used, frequent
title: Craig Kerstiens: Postgres What They Really Use
